lead_paragraph: RUBEN--Lawrence. September 28, 1926 - July 3, 2016. Cherished husband of Jan Ruben and the late Selma Ruben. Beloved father of Richard, Lenore, and Shelly and father-in-law of Howard Kivell and Amy Ruben. Adored grandfather of Tamara, Danielle, William, Andrew, Melissa, Robert, James, Allison and Caroline, and great-grandfather of Blake, Sasha, Jonah, and Owen. As Chairman of Ruben Companies, he helped shape the skyline of New York City. Life Overseer of Weill Cornell Medicine, and Honorary Overseer of Cardozo School of Law. His love and passion for his family, his work, and his city will be missed. Funeral services will be Tuesday, July 5, 12pm, at Riverside Memorial Chapel. Donations in his memory may be made to Weill Cornell Medicine. 1/3
